column6: TA5.7;Renewable Energy;+;3;The implementation of GHG reduction targets in List A can positively influence the achievement of Renewable Energy targets in List B
column7: as reducing greenhouse gas emissions often involves increasing the use of renewable energy sources. This is an indivisible connection
column8: as renewable energy is a crucial component of GHG reduction strategies.

column6: TA5.7;Energy Efficiency;+;3;GHG reduction targets can also reinforce Energy Efficiency targets
column7: as improving energy efficiency is often a key strategy for reducing energy consumption and subsequent greenhouse gas emissions. This connection is reinforcing
column8: as energy efficiency measures can aid in the achievement of GHG reduction goals.

column4: TA7.8;Renewable Energy;+;2;Improving air quality can be aided by the increased use of renewable energy sources
column5: which typically produce little to no air pollution. This connection is reinforcing
column6: as renewable energy can help reduce air pollution from fossil fuels.

column3: TA7.6;Renewable Energy - Hydrogen Production;+;1;Improving water quality can be enabled by the use of renewable energy sources for hydrogen production
column4: which can help reduce pollution from industrial processes. This connection is enabling
column5: as the use of renewable energy for hydrogen production can create conditions that further improve water quality.

column8: TA7.20;Energy Efficiency - Buildings;+;1;Improving soil health can be enabled by energy efficiency measures in buildings
column9: which can reduce the energy needed for heating and cooling
column10: subsequently reducing the demand for fossil fuels and the associated environmental impacts. This connection is enabling
column11: as energy-efficient buildings can create conditions that further improve soil health.

column1: Noise Reduction;TA7.17;Social Security - Energy;+;1;Reducing noise pollution can be enabled by the use of renewable energy sources and energy-efficient technologies
column2: which can help reduce noise from energy generation and consumption. This connection is enabling
column3: as the use of renewable energy and energy-efficient technologies can create conditions that further reduce noise pollution.
TA7.9;Renewable Energy - Solar;+;1;Improving social security through sanitation can be enabled by the use of renewable energy sources
column5: for water treatment and sanitation systems. This connection is enabling
column6: as the use of renewable energy can create conditions that further improve sanitation and social security.
